data.title: 106.9 KROC
data.meta_description: Bob James has been on the 98.1 KHAK airwaves since 1990. He and his wife (Julie) live in Cedar Rapids and have three cats named Charlie, Chance, and Cole. They also have a Shetland Sheepdog (Sheltie) named Carter...
data.text:
Two Iowans Will Be Honored on Float in 2024 Rose Bowl Parade

The organization has a float in the Tournament of Roses Parade each year.

Watch Iowa Man’s $25,000 Christmas Display Tribute to His Mom [VIDEO]

Catch a few minutes of the display here, then take a short trip to see the entire 37 minutes in person.

Iowa Family Gets Christmas Tree So BIG, It Won’t All Fit Inside [WATCH]

The family had to go to extreme measures to make it fit their home.

Beloved Iowa Restaurant Remembered as Favorite Recipes Return

When they were forced to close after 23 years, the community was devastated. Decades later, they're showing just how much they've missed it.

Iowa Teen Hero Recovering After Being Shot in Head While Hunting

It's the second time he's been in the news this year, for very different reasons.

Iowa Fisherman Knows Secret to Catching Huge Flathead Catfish [PHOTOS]

The proof is in the pictures.

Iowa Law Enforcement Warns Residents of Very Sophisticated Scam

Multiple law enforcement agencies in the state are warning about a new scam that can seem very real. In Cedar Rapids, another scam has resurfaced recently.

Five Schools in Iowa Named 2023 National Blue Ribbon Schools

Three Iowa elementary schools, one middle school, and one high school have been recognized as National Blue Ribbon Schools.

Popular ABC Television Show Spotted Filming in the State of Iowa

The footage will be part of an upcoming season.
